projects.title: My-Portfolio
projects.description: A personal portfolio responsive website to showcase my UI development skills & experience, built with React.js.

projects.title: Exchange-engine microservice
projects.description: A high-performance microservice called 'Exchange-engine' built for real-time cryptocurrency exchanges and transactions. Engineered for efficiency, scalability, and reliability, it's capable of handling a large number of users simultaneously while ensuring optimal performance.

projects.title: Chat-widget client (RUST)
projects.description: A lightweight chat widget, allowing for real-time messaging. Created for a Europe based service-website, used for internal use.

projects.title: Chat-widget backend
projects.description: A robust and scalable backend for a chat application, developed with WebSocket to support real-time communication.

projects.title: P2P video-calling app
projects.description: A video-calling app using WebRTC, supporting 1-1 calls with features like muting & disable video, and more.

projects.title: RapidShot-Monitor
projects.description: A real-time employee monitoring tool that provides info and analytics, helping user to track progress.

projects.title: Password-manager-webapp
projects.description: A secure web application for managing and storing passwords, with encryption and user authentication.

projects.title: Image-classification with CNN
projects.description: A project created in final year of college to understand the concept of Deep Learning, Nural network, AI

projects.title: Handwritten Digit Classification
projects.description: A project aimed at classifying handwritten digits using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN). It was developed to explore Deep Learning techniques and their applications in image recognition.
